abstract: Introduction: Erosive pustular dermatosis of the scalp (EPDS) presents as a rare and challenging skin disorder marked by erosions, pustules, and crusted lesions on the scalp. Diagnosing EPDS is complex, often mimicking other dermatological conditions …
